definition: to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column
at a distance of/distance/to be apart

sentences.english: Double - space the essay , and use standard margins.
sentences.chinese: 使用双行距与标准格式的边界设定。

sentences.english: Growing soybean in different row-spacings introduces competition.
sentences.chinese: 不同行距引起大豆生长竞争。

sentences.english: It runs more than 100 pages, single-spaced.
sentences.chinese: 这份报告长达100多页，而且还是单行行距。

sentences.english: A little extra leading can sometimes dramatically improve the legibility of your text.
sentences.chinese: 一点行距就可以大幅度地提高你文档的易读性。

sentences.english: Most business letters are single-spaced with double spaces between the paragraphs.
sentences.chinese: 大部分商务信函的行距为单行，段落之间用双行。

sentences.english: There was interaction of the effects between row spacing and hole spacing of maize on soybean photosynthetic rates.
sentences.chinese: 玉米行距和穴距对间作大豆光合速率具有交互效应。

sentences.english: When text sizing, assume that the size of an image should be a multiple of the basic leading.
sentences.chinese: 在调整文本大小时，假设图像的大小是基本行距倍数。

sentences.english: Do not change the line-width in the Equation Editor.
sentences.chinese: 公式编辑器中的行距不要改动，默认即可。

sentences.english: Essay manuscripts should be typewritten, double-spaced, etc.
sentences.chinese: 论文稿应为电脑列印，双倍行距等。

sentences.english: The line spacing is the vertical distance between the base lines of two consecutive lines of text.
sentences.chinese: 行距是两个连续文本行的基线之间的垂直距离。

sentences.english: Too little leading can make the text look crowded.
sentences.chinese: 过小的行距会让文字看起来拥挤。

definition: to drill (i.e. plant seeds in spaced rows)
to excavate/to dig out a cave
to sprout/to come out (of seedling)/to bud
